resources.string: This account does not have a balance, you must stake it resources using an existing account.
Scanning for airdrop tokens, this can take a while, please be patient.
We could not find any airdrops on this network, try changing the EOS endpoint URL.
We could not find any airdrops associated with this account, the token must be committed to the customtokens contract for it to be considered valid by this app.
We could not fetch airdrops, please check your internet and try again. If this problem persists, try changing the EOS endpoint URL.
